title: (x) University of Sint Eustatius seal - ITC Garamond, ITC Korinna {Yves}
content:
Hi friends

somebody can help id these fonts used for the emblem of University Of Sint Eustatius

Thanks

Miguel

author: hernando

comments.content: And the small type underneath the crown is ITC Korinna.
